metadata.title: In Integrum – Bošany Castle
metadata.description: Renaissance Bošany Castle - a place where history comes back to life. Weddings, conferences, gallery and cultural events.

hero.title: In Integrum
hero.subtitle: Bošany Castle: Restored Heritage
hero.motto: History should not be preserved. It should be brought back to life.

phoenix.title: 17 years of resilience and restoration
phoenix.description: Drag and reveal the story of rescue.

chronicle.title: Where Maria Theresa Slept
chronicle.subtitle: A story spanning five centuries
chronicle.description: From Turkish raids in the 16th century, through the famous visit of the empress, to complete devastation and rebirth. Bošany Castle is a witness to history that refused to be forgotten.

grant.title: Built against all odds
grant.description: Without state support. From the pure determination of one family.

exterior.description: Your day in a Renaissance park, under the castle towers.

park.title: Life in the Park
park.description: We are not a museum behind glass. Our park is a promenade for the public and home to our unconventional residents.

cellar.title: Wine Cellar
cellar.description: Discover the history of tanning in the Šmídov family crypt or taste wine in a former prison.

footer.motto: Where history is not preserved, but brought back to life.

philosophy.subtitle: Air conditioning designed 400 years ago
philosophy.description: A meter of stone for your perfect comfort. We reject polystyrene and modern insulation. The thick castle walls provide natural climate - pleasant coolness in summer, warmth in winter.
